sections.tag: NO DIA A DIA DA SAÚDE
sections.title: Contabilidade consultiva para clínicas, consultórios e laboratórios
paragraphs: O setor de saúde tem particularidades que exigem atenção: diferentes fontes de receita, convênios, repasses, glosas, alto controle de despesas e rotinas trabalhistas sensíveis. Quando a contabilidade não acompanha essa complexidade, a gestão perde previsibilidade — e o risco cresce.

A Malaquias atua com uma equipe preparada para estruturar a contabilidade da saúde com foco em conformidade, controle e resultado. Integramos fiscal, contábil e financeiro para entregar relatórios claros, organização de processos e suporte consultivo para decisões mais seguras.

sections.title: Estruture crescimento, filiais e novas unidades com segurança jurídica
paragraphs: Abrir novas unidades, ampliar equipe, contratar especialistas ou investir em equipamentos exige planejamento e governança. Sem estrutura contábil e tributária adequada, a expansão pode gerar passivos, inconsistências e surpresas no fluxo de caixa.

Apoiamos sua clínica ou empresa de saúde na organização societária, planejamento tributário e padronização de rotinas para crescer com previsibilidade. Nosso foco é reduzir riscos, proteger o patrimônio e fortalecer a gestão para uma operação sustentável.

sections.title: Consultative accounting for clinics, practices and laboratories
paragraphs: Healthcare has specific complexities that require attention: multiple revenue sources, insurance contracts, reimbursements, denials, strict expense control and sensitive payroll routines. When accounting doesn’t keep up, management loses predictability — and risk increases.

Malaquias provides a team ready to structure healthcare accounting focused on compliance, control and results. We integrate tax, accounting and finance to deliver clear reports, organized processes and consultative support for safer decisions.

sections.title: Structure growth, new branches and units with legal certainty
paragraphs: Opening new units, expanding staff, hiring specialists or investing in equipment requires planning and governance. Without the right accounting and tax structure, expansion can create liabilities, inconsistencies and cash-flow surprises.

We support your clinic or healthcare company with corporate structuring, tax planning and standardized routines to scale with predictability. Our focus is to reduce risks, protect assets and strengthen management for a sustainable operation.

questions.question: Is accounting for clinics and practices different from traditional accounting?
questions.answer: Yes. Healthcare has specifics such as insurance revenue, reimbursements, denials, sensitive payroll routines and strict cost control. Specialized accounting improves control and reduces risks.

questions.question: Can you structure cost centers by unit and specialty?
questions.answer: Yes. We set up cost centers and management reports to track margins, expenses and productivity by unit, specialty or service.

questions.question: How can we reduce taxes without increasing compliance risk?
questions.answer: With planning: correct classification, review of calculations, organized documentation and compliance. The goal is to pay what’s due and avoid overpayment.

questions.question: Do you support multi-unit clinics?
questions.answer: Yes. We support accounting and corporate structuring for groups and networks, with standardized routines and unit-level KPIs.

questions.question: Do you serve healthcare businesses across Brazil?
questions.answer: Yes. We serve nationwide with digital processes, remote meetings and secure document exchange.
